metadata.title: CVE-2022-27774 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An insufficiently protected credentials vulnerability exists in curl 4.9 toand include curl 7.82.0 are affected that could allow an attacker toextract credentials when follows HTTP(S) redirects is used withauthentication could leak credentials to other services that exist ondifferent protocols or port numbers.

criterions.comment: curl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'regressions likely').
